title: Drawing, "Design for a Stage Set: Antique Buildings", 1800–25
medium: drawing- sepia wash and pencil on paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Horizontal rectangle: fantastic antique buildings through which a flight of stairs is leading up, lined on both sides with a row of sphinxes.

Drawing, "Design for a Stage Set: Antique Buildings", 1800–25.
1800–25. drawing- sepia wash and pencil on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-245.
